statements.statement: SELECT MAYTE AS PATIENTCODE, TENBENHNHAN AS PATIENTNAME, NAMSINH AS PATIENTYOB, (CASE WHEN GIOITINH=1 THEN 'Nam' ELSE N'Nữ' END) AS GENDER FROM TT_BENHNHAN WHERE MAYTE='$PATIENTCODE$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA_ID AS PATIENTCODE, TENNGUOIMUA AS PATIENTNAME, NAMSINH AS PATIENTYOB, (CASE WHEN GIOITINH=1 THEN 'Nam' ELSE N'Nữ' END) AS GENDER FROM TT_NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA WHERE NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA_ID='$MATOATHUOC$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$'
